mapper.insert:

mapper.delete: DELETE FROM auth_customer WHERE 1 = 1 and id = #{id}
UPDATE auth_customer SET is_del = 1 WHERE 1 = 1 and id = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE auth_customer SET
account = #{account},
password = #{password},
employee_code = #{employeeCode},
type = #{type},
lock_flag = #{lockFlag},
is_del = #{isDel},
code = #{code},
rfid_container_code = #{rfidContainerCode},
name = #{name},
rfid_code = #{rfidCode},
auth_position_code = #{authPositionCode},
auth_department_code = #{authDepartmentCode},
auth_agency_code = #{authAgencyCode},
id = #{id} WHERE 1 = 1 and id = #{id}
